tweets.text: Vegetation clearance starts from tomorrow. A very short visit this am incl: nest building Whitethroat, territorial Cetti's/Reed Warbler & Reed Bunting. Video shows how farcical this is! Still time to see sense @EnvAgency @kiergroup @Natures_Voice @Bucktonbirder  PLEASE RETWEET https://t.co/Tve0B6o4va

https://t.co/9vKapgSGUn tell people to email and then the email suddenly doesn't work.Something doesn't quite add up.A little like not having the monitoring stations plugged in on one of the worst weekends @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids #StopTheStink #notfitforpurpose @StinkStopthe https://t.co/qXVbNru1va

It’s a modern day @ErinBrockovich going right here across Staffordshire! We want to breathe fresh air. waste comes from @BBCScotlandNews other countries @cnnbrk who are sensible enough to know the risks of managing the waste in landfill near residential homes. @StinkStopthe https://t.co/bFoxY01m4Q

tweets.text:
Poisoned for Profit
